from django.contrib import admin
from .models import User, Profile

admin.site.register(User)
admin.site.register(Profile)

from django.db import models
from django.contrib.auth.models import AbstractUser

class User(AbstractUser):
    pass

class Profile(models.Model):
    user = models.OneToOneField(User, on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    bio = models.TextField(blank=True)
    location = models.CharField(max_length=100, blank=True)
    # Add more fields as needed

17.code:
import os
import pandas as pd
import statsmodels.api as sm

# File paths
input_file = "Gamedata.xlsx"
output_file = "Logistic.xlsx"

def read_and_validate_data(input_file):
    df = pd.read_excel(input_file)
    if df.isnull().values.any():
        raise ValueError("Dataset contains missing values.")
    for col in df.columns:
        if not pd.api.types.is_numeric_dtype(df[col]):
            raise TypeError(f"Column '{col}' is not numeric.")
    return df

def add_lagged_dependent_variable(data, target_column):
    data[target_column + '_lag'] = data[target_column].shift(1)
    data.dropna(inplace=True)
    return data

def prepare_features_and_target(data, target_column, lagged_column):
    X = data.drop([target_column, lagged_column], axis=1)
    y = data[target_column]
    return X, y

def build_logistic_model(X, y):
    logit_model = sm.Logit(y, X)
    result = logit_model.fit()
    return result

def save_summary_to_excel(result, output_file):
    result.summary().to_excel(output_file, index=False)

def main(input_file, output_file):
    df = read_and_validate_data(input_file)
    target_column = 'Target'
    lagged_column = target_column + '_lag'
    df = add_lagged_dependent_variable(df, target_column)
    X, y = prepare_features_and_target(df, target_column, lagged_column)
    result = build_logistic_model(X, y)
    save_summary_to_excel(result, output_file)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main(input_file, output_file)
